titles: The covenant; or, No king but the old king's son, or, A brief rehearsall of what heretofore was done. All sorts of people of it take a view ... To the tune of, True blew [sic] will never stain.
notes: Right half of sheet contains "The Second Part, To the same Tune."
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow Library.
keywords: Charles --  II, --  King of England, 1630-1685 --  Poetry.
